content_data.quote: Finally found a store that carries ALL my favorite brands! The Mielle oil has been a game changer for my edges. Fast shipping and everything arrived in perfect condition.
Best prices on Andis clippers I've found online. I've ordered multiple times for my shop and the customer service is top notch. Highly recommend for fellow barbers!
The bundles I ordered were amazing quality! Minimal shedding and held a curl beautifully. Already planning my next order.
Love being able to get all my family's hair products in one place. From my daughter's Cantu to my husband's grooming products - Bakalr has it all!
The wholesale program is perfect for my salon. Great discounts and quick delivery. My clients always ask where I get my products!
Been on my loc journey for 2 years and the products here are perfect. The Shea Moisture Loc & Braid Butter keeps my locs moisturized without buildup.
